reviewText: Very little substance and do not think there was remotely enough to compel any type of video. Just endless dialog going really no where.

Were I a ghost, I would live in the anchor pub. What a cool place to haunt! Anyway, this was beyond entertaining & quite spooky. The ghost hunters are all quite the characters, but this (unlike a lot of big budget Hollywood "ghost hunter" shows) was actually believable.
Ghost hunting in England is explored here. for whatever reason I feel like you'd be more likely to find a ghost there just about anywhere. I thoroughly enjoyed this program.
I got hooked on paranormal stuff after having watched a bunch of the shows on cable. This is right up there with that stuff, probably better actually. Some cool ghost hunting action.
